title: 01/26/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/26/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, a year after Kobe Bryant's death, DP pays tribute to the Black Mamba. We're joined by ESPN NBA insider, Ramona Shleburne, who spent a lot of time covering throughout his career. Former BYU star Jimmer Fredette joins us from China and tells. s story about being guarded by Kobe in his first game in the NBA. Plus, Chris Simms zooms in and explains why he thinks Deshaun Watson to the Jets is not a slam dunk.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On Today's Dan Patrick Show, a year after Kobe Bryant's death, DP pays tribute to the Black Mamba. We're joined by ESPN NBA insider, Ramona Shleburne, who spent a lot of time covering throughout his career. Former BYU star Jimmer Fredette joins us from China and tells. s story about being guarded by Kobe in his first game in the NBA. Plus, Chris Simms zooms in and explains why he thinks Deshaun Watson to the Jets is not a slam dunk.
